Plot: A collaborative and ground-breaking 6-part series about the culture and history of the iconoclastic state of Vermont. Several dozen award-winning Vermont filmmakers came together to make a ...
Title: Freedom & Unity: The Vermont Movie
Director: Sue Bettmann, Jay Craven, Nora Jacobson, Rob Koier, Robin Lloyd, Louise Michaels, Kate Purdie, Andrew Reichsman, Dorothy Tod, Jill Vickers
